1D???A¢DO¢D?¡nP?W|P¡EN?A¢Di¡nP?¡±|??A¢Di¡nP?¡±¢D??A|??¢G??|M?]?F?????A3¡Ó?¡±?B?H?¡n?B(R)????]?F|a???A¡n¡E???B?I(C)??B1/4s¡ÂU?B|?¢D??]?F¡ÓN???A?1/4?B¡mH?B?¡Â?B¡mi?B?Y?]?F?k???A|¡Ó???B(C)x1D?B¢DD¢D??]?C?Z|1?-???A¡ÓN2??¢G¡nD?A?3/4?¡±??3??A?¢G?3/4???¢G3??C

?G(R)??¡±¢DH-p?A|?¡Â???¡Ó??A???G¢DD¡ÓE|31D?H¡ÓN¡ÓE|3¡Â??H??|a¡ÓE¡Óo?H?k¢DO¡ÓE|ae?H¡±L23¡ÓE¡Ój?H?h??¡ÓE1/2m?H1/2?¡n@¡ÓE(C)??H¡±^¢DH|1?3/43?-t?o?C

(R)]?l???G?Z¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A1¢G?(R)?d3/4o?A-2?(R)?d-1/4?A¡Óa¢D??Q?U?A?d?1/2?X?3?C¡mh??¢D~?¡±?O?A¡n¡m¡m??¡±¢D??A1/2|?¢G?¡±¡±¡Ò?A?(R)¢D??¡±(C)^?A???O?d?¡Ò?A£gM¡m??Q?U?¡±(R)v?|?o?C

£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A¡±??¢G|A?y?A?3?¢G?T???A??¢D?(C)?¢X??A|]?3(C)?1/4??A?G-x-1¢Di???]?C¢X??¡±3h(C)?(R)v??¡n¡E???A¡n¡E??¡mh|?(C)m3h?F??(C)?(R)v???Q1/2ae?A?Q1/2ae¡mh|?(C)m???A¢X]??¡mh¡mae(C)?¢DC¡±??C?O(C)}¢X]???A??-???£g?(C)?(R)a?A|?(C)m?¡±?O?A?Q¢Dh???C?F?1/2(R)a?¡±?O?A¡Â}-x1/2}¢X??A¢D?-H¢D?(C)??A?u??¢D??r?A¢DC???j?(R)?A?Q¢Dh???¡n?C

?¢G3??¢G1L23?H?¡±(C)??3/4?A¡mD£g1/2?¡±£g1/2???]?F3/4?3?|????U??£g1/2?A¡mD£g1/2?¡±£g1/2???]?C?G?|??2@?¢G?¢X|h?O?A?¢G?????¢G?¢X(C)?¢D??A¡nD1p3/4^?¢G?¢X?o|??C¢Dj?¡±£g1/23/4????A3?(C)?(C)?3????]?C?G£g1/23/4????¡±3??]?A£gL?1/4|W?A£gL¡mi¢D\?A?G??3/4?3??¢G???C?¢G?????A??(C)?¡Ó1¢D23??A3??w¡Ó????]?C?G£g1/23/4????A¢D?¢D?(C)??¢G¡Ó??¡±|a?A|??¢G¢D¢F1/4??¡±¡Ó??]?C?O?G3?¡±L¢D?3??A|?¡m??D3/4??A¡Ó?¡±L¢D?3/4?|?¡m??D3??C£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A-¡Ñ1D|?¡mO?k?A?G¡Â??¢X3?¡Ó??¡±?F?C

?Z3/4????A¢DH¢D?|X?A¢DH(C)_3??C?G£g1/2¢DX(C)_???A£gL1/2a|p??|a?A?¢G??|p|?(R)??C2¡Ñ|?1/2AE(C)l?A?????O?]?C|?|??_¢D??A¢D|(R)??O?]?C?n?¢G1L?-?A?-?n?¡±???A?¢G¢Di3??¢D?]?F|??¢G1L?-?A?-|??¡±???A?¢G¢Di3?AE[?]?F???¢G1L?-?A?-???¡±???A?¢G¢Di3?1??]?F3/4????A?¢G1L(C)_¢D??A(C)_¢D??¡±???A?¢G¢Di3?1/2a?]?C(C)_¢D???¢D??A|p?`???¡±£gL???A1/4?¡Â?1/2a?¡±¡mv?H

?E???¡±¡Âe?A|?(C)??}¢D????A???]?F¡Ò?33/4?¡±¡Âe?A|?(C)?¡E?¡±????A?`?]?C?O?G£g1/23/4????A?????I?A???`£gu?C??|p¡Ói(C)??A?`|p£go3/4¡Ò?C

¡Â?¡Â?¡ÂAE¡ÂAE?A¢X¡m??|??¢G¢Di???]?F?????P?P?A¡±???|??¢G¢Di¡Ó??]?C??¢D?(C)??v?A(C)?¢D?(C)?¡mi?A(R)z¢D?(C)?¡Ój?C?v???A1/4AE?]?F¡mi(C)??A???]?F¡Ój(R)z?A¡±??]?C?G£g1/2¢X?1/4????A¡±??¡±?A1/4?¢D2¡Óq?¡±?F?(C)?¡±?A1/4?¢D2???¡±?C¢DH¡±Q¢X??¡±?A¢DH??¡m??¡±?C

?G£g1/23/4????A-P?H|??¢G-P(C)??H?C¡Â???1/4??H|?|????A¡±Q?¡±?]?F¡Â???1/4??H?¢G¡Óo|????A(R)`?¡±?]?C?G1/4?¡±H¡Â?3??¡±?A1?¡Â????¡±?A|w¡Â?¢X??¡±?C¢DX??(C)?¢D2???A????(C)??¢G¡EN?C|ae?d?1/2|??¢G3????A|ae(C)?£gL?H?¡±|a?]?F¡±?|?¢D2?????A¡±???(C)??¢G|u?]?C|u|?¢D2(C)T???A|u??(C)??¢G¡±??]?C

?G£g1/2¡±????A1/4??¢G?3/4??(C)?|u?F£g1/2|u???A1/4??¢G?3/4??(C)?¡±??C¡EL¢DG¡EL¢DG?A|?(C)?£gL¡±??F¡Â¡m¢DG¡Â¡m¢DG?A|?(C)?£gL?n?A?G¡Â??¢X1/4??¡±¢Dq(C)R?C?i|??¢G¢Di?m???A?R??£g??]?F¢Xh|??¢G¢Di¢Xl???A3t|??¢G¢Di???]?C?G¡±?¡Ó?3/4??A1/4???¢X??S2`¡E3/4?A?¢G¡Óo?¢G¡nP¡±?3/4????A¡±???(C)?¢D2¡Ó??]?F¡±??¢G¡Ó?3/4??A??£ge|a|?|u?¡±?A1/4??¢G¡Óo¡nP¡±?3/4????A????(C)??¡±?]?C?G¡±??H|?¡±?£gL¡±??A¡mh¡±?¡ÓM|?1/4????C¡±?¡ÓM?¢X?@?A1/4????¢X?Q?A?O¢DH?Q¡±????@?]?C¡mh¡±?231/4?1??A¡Â?¢DH23?¡n1????A¡mh¡±^?¡±(C)?¡nP3/4??????o?C¡±^(C)?¡nP3/4??¡±|a?¢G¢Di?3/4?A?¢G¢Di?3/4¡mh1/4?(C)?3AE??|h?A1/4?(C)?3AE??|h?A¡mh¡±^(C)?¡nP3/4???1??o?C?G3AE¡me¡mh¡m?1??A3AE¡m?¡mh¡me1??A3AE¢D?¡mh¢Dk1??A3AE¢Dk¡mh¢D?1??A£gL(C)??¢G3AE?A¡mh£gL(C)??¢G1??C1????A3AE?H???]?F23???A???H3AE?v???]?C?G?3/43/4??¡±|a?A?3/43/4??¡±???A¡mh¢Di?d?1/2|?¡E|3/4??F?¢G?3/43/4??¡±|a?A?¢G?3/43/4????A¡mh¢D??¢G¡Â?¡Ó?¢Dk?A¢Dk?¢G¡Â?¡Ó?¢D??A¡me?¢G¡Â?¡Ó?¡m??A¡m??¢G¡Â?¡Ó?¡me?A|??p¡n¡E??1/4AE?Q???A????1/4AE??¢DG?I¢DH¡±^¡m¡Ñ?¡±?A?V?H?¡±¡±L??|h?A¢D?(R)O¡Âq(C)?3?¡mv?I?G???G3?¢Di?¢X?]?C1/4???23?A¢Di??£gL¢X¡m?C?G£g|?¡±|??3/4¡Óo¢D¢F?¡±-p?A-??¡±|??3/4¢X??R?¡±2z?A¡±??¡±|??3/4|?¢D??¡±|a?A???¡±|??3/4|33/4l?¢G???¡±3B?C?G¡±?¡±L?¡±¡E¢D?A|?(C)?£gL¡±??C£gL¡±?¡mh2`???¢G¡Â??s?A?1/4???¢G¡Â????C|]¡±?|?¡Ó13?(C)?23?A23?¢G¡Â??3/4?C?H???3/4¡±?(C)?¢DH3??¡±¡±??A|?2??3/4¡±^(C)?¢DH??3??¡±¡±??C?G??3/4?3??¢G?_?A|??3¡±?(C)?£gL1/2a?C??¡±L¡±??H???A???¡±|ae?¡Ñ¢X?|????U?A¡±L?¡±¡±??¡Ñ1?|??¡n£g??F??|]|a|????y?A¡±L|]1/4?|???3??C?G¡±L£gL¡Ó`???A??£gL¡Ó`¡±??C¡Â?|]1/4????AE|???3????A?¡Ñ?¡±¡Â¡m?C?G?-|ae£gL¡Ó`3??A¢D|(R)?£gL¡Ó`|??A??|3£gu???A??|3|?¢D??C

-x?¡±2??C

(R)]?l???G ?Z¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A¡ÓN??(C)R(C)?¡±g?A|X-x¡nE23?A¢Dae(C)M|????A2???(C)?-x?¡±?C-x?¡±?¡±?????A¢DH?¡Ó?¢X?1/2?A¢DH¡Ów?¢X¡±Q?C?G?¡Ó??3~?A|?¡n??¡±¢DH¡±Q?A¡m??H£go?A¢D??H|??A|1?3/4?¡Ó?1/2?¡±-p???]?C-x?¡±?¢X¡±Q?A-x?¡±?¢X|M?C?|-x|??¡±¡±Q¡mh?¢G???A(C)e-x|??¡±¡±Q¡mh1/2?-¡m(R)1/2?C?O?G¡Ó2¢D?|????A??(C)]?¢G3B?A-?1D-?|ae?A|???|??¡±¡±Q?A¡mh3/4??T¡ÓN-x?A¡ml??¢D??A¡Âh??¡m??A???k?Q?@|?|??F?-?Q??|??¡±¡±Q?A¡mh???W¡ÓN-x?A???k¢Db|??F?T?Q??|??¡±¡±Q?A¡mh?T???¡±?G|??C?O?G-x£gL1/2?-¡m¡mh?`?A£gL?3-1¡mh?`?A£gL(C)e?n¡mh?`?C?G?¢G?3/41/2?¡mJ?¡±?????A?¢G¡Â???¢Dae?F?¢G?3/4?s?L?B?I???B?q?A?¡±¡±????A?¢G¡Â?|ae-x?F?¢G¢D??m3/4????A?¢G¡Â?¡Óo|a¡±Q?C?G¡±L¢DH?B¢D??A¢DH¡±Q¢X??A¢DH??(C)M?¢X?????]?C?G??¡Âe|p-¡E?A??(R)}|p?L?A¡mI¡Ó¢X|p???A?¢G¢X?|p?s?A???3/4|p3¡Ó?A¢X?|p1p3/4_?C¡Ó¢X?m??23?A1?|a??¡±Q?A?a?v|?¢X??C¢D??3/4?¡Ó?1/2?¡±-p??3??A|1-x?¡±?¡±?k?]?C?m-x?F?n???G?¡±?¢D?¢G??¡nD?A?G?¢X?¡±?¡Ò1??F£g??¢G???¢G?A?G?¢X?¡±¡Ó??X?C?????¡Ò1?¡Ó??X???A(C)?¢DH?@¢D??¡±|?¢D??]?C¢D??J¡ÓM?@?A¡mh¡mi???¢G¡Óo?W?i?A(C)????¢G¡Óo?W¢Xh?A|1¢D?23?¡±?k?]?C?G(C)]3/4?|h?¡Ò1??A¡Ó?3/4?|h¡Ó??X?A(C)?¢DH???H?¡±|?¢D??]?C?T-x¢Di1?(R)??A¡ÓN-x¢Di1????C?O?G??(R)?3/4U?A¡Ó?(R)??k?A1/4?(R)??k?C£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A?¡Ñ??3/4U(R)??A?¡n???k?k?A|1?v(R)????]?C¢DH?v¡m????A¢DH?R¡m?1/4M?A|1?v?????]?C¢DH??¡m?¡n¡E?A¢DH¡±H¡m?3??A¢DH1?¡m????A|1?v?O???]?C£gL??¢D?¢D??¡±?X?A£gL?¡n¢X?¢X??¡±3¡Â?A|1?v?????]?C?G¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A¢X?3(R)??|V?A-I¢DC??¢Xf?A??¢D_??¡Óq?A3/4U????¡±??A¡n?¡±L??-1?A?k(R)v??1K?A3?(R)v?????A1/2a¡ÓF??-¢F?A|1¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?]?C

?E??2??K

(R)]?l???G ?Z¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A¡ÓN??(C)R(C)?¡±g?A|X-x¡nE|X?C?x|a£gL???A??|a|X¢Dae?A£g?|a£gL¡Âd?A3?|a¡mh???A|?|a¡mh3/4??A3~|3(C)??¢G¢D??A-x|3(C)??¢G?¡n?A¡m¢X|3(C)??¢G¡±??A|a|3(C)??¢G?¡±?A¡±g(C)R|3(C)??¢G???C?G¡ÓN3q(C)??E???¡±¡±Q???A?3/4¢D?¡±L?o?F¡ÓN?¢G3q?E???¡±¡±Q?A???3/4|a¡±??A?¢G¡Â?¡Óo|a?¡±¡±Q?o?F?v¡±L?¢G?3/4?E???¡±3N?A???3/4?-¡±Q?A?¢G¡Â?¡Óo?H?¡±¢D??o?C?O?G?1/4???¡±1/4{?A¢D2??(C)?¡±Q(R)`?A??(C)?¡±Q|?¢X?¢Di¡mH?]?A??(C)?(R)`|?¡Ów¢Di???]?C?O?G(C)}1/2?¡mJ??¢DH(R)`?A¡±?1/2?¡mJ??¢DH¡E~?A??1/2?¡mJ??¢DH¡±Q?C?G¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A£gL¡m????¢G???A¡m?¡±^|3¢DH¡m??¡±?F£gL¡m????¢G¡±??A¡m?¡±^|3(C)??¢G¢Di¡±??]?C?G¡ÓN|3?-|M?A¢D2|?¢Di¡Ó??A¢D2¢D?¢Di???A(C)?3t¢Di¡mV?A¡EG1/4?¢Di¢Xd?A¡ER¢D?¢Di¡E??C?Z|1?-???A¡ÓN?¡±1L?]?A¢D?¡±L?¡±?a?]?C??-x¡Ó?¡ÓN?A¢D2¢DH?-|M?A?¢G¢Di?¢G1??]?C

|ae-x2??E

(R)]?l???G?Z3B-x??1/4??A£g??s??1/2\?A£g?¢D?3B¢X??A3/4??(C)£gL£gn?A|13B?s?¡±-x?]?C£g???¢D2¡n¡E???A¡m?£g???|????A?????¡±(C)??????A¢DO¢Db??|??¡n?¡±¡±Q?A¡Ó?3/4????A£gL??(C)???|???¡m??A£g?¢D?3B¢X??A£gL?????y?A|13B???W?¡±-x?]?C£g?¢D??A?A¢X?¡mE¢Dh£gL¡Âd?A-Y¢Dae-x(C)?¢D??A?¡±???A¢D2????¡Â?|?-I233/4??A|13B¢D??A?¡±-x?]?C¢D-3¢X3B(C)??A¢Dk-I¢X??A¡me|?¡m?¢D??A|13B¢D-3¢X?¡±-x?]?C?Z|1¢D|-x?¡±¡±Q?A??¡m??¡±(C)?¢DH3?¢D|¡m??]?C?Z-x|n¢X?|??c?U?A?Q?¡±|?1/2?3¡Ó?A3/4i¢D?|?3B1??A-x£gL|?¡Âe?A?O?¡Ñ¢D23??C¢DC3(R)3??3/4?A¢D23B???¡±|?¢Dk-I?¡±?A|1¡±L?¡±¡±Q?A|a?¡±¡±U?]?C?W¡mB???y|??A¡Ó?¡ÂA???A¡m???(C)w?]?C?Z|a|3£g?1/4??B???¡m?B???c?B???1?B??3??B??¡n??A¢D2¡mE¢Dh?¡±?A?????]?C¡±^¡n¡E?¡±?A1/4????¡±?F¡±^???¡±?A1/4?-I?¡±?C-x(R)?|3?I???BaeC?¡m?B???£g?B?p?L?B?¡Ò?P???A¢D2????¡Â??¡±?A|1¢D?¡m??¡±(C)?3B?]?C1/4???|??R???A¡m????I?]?F¡n¡E|??D3/4????A¡Ó??H?¡±?i?]?F??(C)?(C)~(C)????A¡±Q?]?F233/4?¢X????A???]?F23¡Â?|h¡n????A???]?F33/4¢X_???A¢D??]?F?~?b???A???]?F1?¢X?|?3/4U???A?(R)???]?F??|?1/4s???A(R){???]?F?2|?¡Ó?1F???A3/4?¡Ó??]?F??|?(C)1?????A??-x?]?F????|?3AE???A?i?]?F??¡Ój|??i?X???A¢Xh?]?F¡n??(R)¢D?¢DX(C)~??¢X1/4???A3¡Â?]?F£gL??|?1/2?(C)M???A???]?F(C)b?¡m|?3¡Â¡±L???A???]?F¢Db?i¢Db¢Xh???A¡n??]?F¡±?|?¢D????A???]?F?V|?¢D??1/4???A?¡Ò?]?F?¢G¡±Q|??¢G?i???A3??]?F33/4?¢X???A£g??]?F(C)](C)I???A(R)¢G?]?F-x?Z???A¡ÓN?¢G-¡m?]?F¡Ó??X¢X????A???]?F|O¡m????A-??]?F¡Ó?¢X?|¡Ñ-1???A-x£gL?3?]?F?a???¢G?????????A1/2a¡ÓF?]?F1/2?1/2?£g?£g??A(R)}¡nP?H?¢D???A¢D¢F23?]?F1/4AE1/2????A£g~?]?F1/4AE¡n@???A¡±x?]?F¢D?1/4?|?¡m?????23???A?¢G???¡±|??]?F??(C)e?????A¡Ó?¢D?(R)¡±?]?C¡±L¡m?|??????A?[|??¢G|X?A?S?¢G??¢Dh?A¢D2??1??¡±?C¡±L¡mD?Q¡Âq|h?]?A¡Ó(C)£gL?Z?i?A??¢DH???O(R)AE1/4????H|??w?C??¡Ó(C)£gL1/4{|?(C)?1/4????A¢D23/4?(C)??H?C??¢D1/4??|?¡n@?¡±?A¡mh?¢G?A?A?¢G?A¡mh??¢D??C???w????|?¡n@?¢G|ae?A¡mh?¢G¢Di¢D??C?G|X?¡±¢DH???A¡n??¡±¢DH?Z?A?O?¡Ñ¢D2???C¢DO¡Â?|ae¢DH¡Ó???¢D??A¡mh¢D??A?F¢DO¡Â??¢G|ae¢DH¡Ó???¢D??A¡mh¢D??¢G?A?C¢DO¡Â?|ae???A¡nP23??¡Óo?]?C

|a¡±?2??Q

(R)]?l???G|a¡±?|33q???B|3¡Ó3/4???B|3?????B|31i???B|3?I???B|3¡n¡E???C¡±?¢Di¢DH(C)1?A(C)1/4¢Di¢DH???A??3q?C3q¡±????A¢D?(C)~¢X??¡±?A¡±Q?31D?A¢DH3/4?¡mh¡±Q?C¢Di¢DH(C)1?A??¢DH???A??¡Ó3/4?C¡Ó3/4¡±????A1/4?£gL3AE?A¢DX|?3??¡±?A1/4?-Y|33AE?A¢DX|??¢G3??A??¢DH???A?¢G¡±Q?C¡±?¢DX|??¢G¡±Q?A(C)1/4¢DX|??¢G¡±Q?A?????C??¡±????A1/4???¡±Q¡±??A¡±?£gL¢DX?]?A??|?¢Dh?¡±?A¢DO1/4?¢Db¢DX|??¡n?¡±¡±Q?C1i¡±????A¡±?¢D?(C)~?¡±?A¢D2???¡±¢DH¡m?1/4??C-Y1/4?¢D?(C)~?¡±?A??|???¡Óq?A?¢G??|?¡Óq?¡±?C?I¡±????A¡±?¢D?(C)~?¡±?A¢D2(C)~¢X??¡±¢DH¡m?1/4??F-Y1/4?¢D?(C)~?¡±?A??|?¢Dh?¡±?A??¡Óq?]?C¡n¡E¡±????A??¡±???¢DH?D3/4??A3/4?|??¢G¡±Q?C?Z|1?¡n???A|a?¡±1D?]?A¡ÓN?¡±|?¢D??A?¢G¢Di?¢G1??]?C?Z¡±L|3?¡m???B|31¢G???B|33????B|3¡ÓY???B|3?????B|3¢D_???C?Z|1?¡n???A¡mD??|a?¡±?a?A¡ÓN?¡±1L?]?C????¡±??A¢DH?@?¡n?Q?A???¡m?F??¡Ój|O(R)z?A??1¢G?F|O¡Ój??(R)z?A??3??F?j|O¡m?|??¢G?A?A1J1/4???|?|?3/4??A¡ÓN?¢G?3/4??¡Â??A??¡ÓY?F¡ÓN(R)z?¢G?Y?A¡Ó?1D?¢G(C)??A|O??£gL¡Ó`?A3¡Â¡±L?a3/4??A?????F¡ÓN?¢G¡Â?(R)AE1/4??A¢DH??|X23?A¢DH(R)z?¡n¡Ój?A¡±L£gL??3/4W?A??¢D_?C?Z|1?¡n???A¡Ó??¡±1D?]?A¡ÓN?¡±|?¢D??A?¢G¢Di?¢G1??]?C??|a¡±????A¡±L?¡±¡±U?]?C(R)AE1/4???3??A-p?I1i¡n¡E???A?W¡ÓN?¡±1D?]?C?3/4|1|?¢D?3/4???¢D23??A?¢G?3/4|1|?¢D?3/4???¢D2¡Ó??C?G3/4?1D¢D23??A¢DD??£gL3/4??A¢D23/4?¢Di?]?F3/4?1D?¢G3??A¢DD??¢D23/4??A£gL3/4?¢Di?]?C?G?i?¢G?D|W?A¢Xh?¢G?¡Ñ?o?A¢X?¢D??O¡mO?A|?¡±Q(C)?¢DD?A¢X??¡±?_?]?C£g???|p?|???A?G¢Di¢DH¡nP?¡±-u2`¡E??F£g???|p¡ER?l?A?G¢Di¡nP?¡±-?|??C¡mp|??¢G¡Â????A¡ER|??¢G¡Â?¢DO?A??|??¢G¡Â??v?A??-Y???l?A?¢G¢Di¢D??]?C?3/4¡±^???¡±¢Di¢DH?¡n?A|??¢G?3/41/4??¡±?¢G¢Di?¡n?A3??¡±¢Db?]?F?3/41/4??¡±¢Di?¡n?A|??¢G?3/4¡±^???¡±?¢G¢Di¢DH?¡n?A3??¡±¢Db?]?F?3/41/4??¡±¢Di?¡n?A?3/4¡±^???¡±¢Di¢DH?¡n?A|??¢G?3/4|a¡±??¡±?¢G¢Di¢DH3/4??A3??¡±¢Db?]?C?G?3/4¡±L???A¢X?|??¢G¢Xg?A?||??¢G1/2a?C?G???G?3/4(C)1/4?3/4?v?A3??D?¢G?p?F?3/4???3/4|a?A3??D¢Di¢D??C

?E|a2??Q?@

(R)]?l???G¢D?¡±L?¡±?k?A|3?2|a?A|3¡n?|a?A|3?¡±|a?A|3¢Dae|a?A|3??|a?A|3-¡m|a?A|3?x|a?A|33?|a?A|3|?|a?C1/2?¡mJ|?3/4???|a???A?¢X?2|a?F?J?H?¡±|a?¢G2`???A?¢X¡n?|a?F¡±?¡Óo¢D?¡±Q?A(C)1/4¡Óo¢D?¡±Q???A?¢X?¡±|a?F¡±?¢Di¢DH(C)1?A(C)1/4¢Di¢DH?????A?¢X¢Dae|a?F1/2?¡mJ?¡±|a?T???A¢D?|?|?¡Óo???U23???A?¢X??|a?F?J?H?¡±|a2`?A-I¡m¢X??|h???A?¢X-¡m|a?F?s?L?B?I???B?q?A?A?Z??|ae?¡±1D???A?¢X?x|a?F(C)?¢D??J??1i?A(C)?¡Óq?k???¡Ó?A(C)1/41?¢Di¢DH?¡n¡±^?¡±23???A?¢X3?|a?F¡Âe3/4?¡mh|s?A?¢G¡Âe3/4?¡mh?`???A?¢X|?|a?C?O?G?2|a¡mh£gL3/4??A¡n?|a¡mh£gL???A?¡±|a¡mh£gL¡±??A¢Dae|a¡mh£gL£g??A??|a¡mh|X¢Dae?A-¡m|a¡mh¡Ó¢X?A?x|a¡mh|ae?A3?|a¡mh???A|?|a¡mh3/4??C¢Dj?¡±£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A¡Â???1/4??H¡me¡m??¢G?????A231??¢G??¡m??A?Q1/2??¢G??¡Ó??A?W?U?¢G??|??A???¡Ò|??¢G?¢X?A¡±L|X|??¢G¡n??C|X(C)?¡±Q|?¢X??A?¢G|X(C)?¡±Q|????C?¡Ó¢X?1/4?23|?3/4?¡ÓN???A¡m??¡±-Y|????G¢D?1???(C)?¡ER¡mh?¢D?o?C¡±L?¡±¡Ó?¢DD3t?A-1/4?H?¡±?¢G???C¢D??¢G?¡E?¡±1D?A¡±???(C)??¢G¡±??]?C?Z?¢X¡m??¡±1D?A2`?J¡mh¡ÓM?C¢DD?H?¢G¡±J?A¡Ó¢X(C)???3¢D?A?T-x??-1?C??3/4i|???3??A??(R)??n?O?A1B¡±L-p???A?¢X?¢G¢Di???C¡±??¡±£gL(C)?(C)1?A|?¢DB?¢G¢D_?C|?2j?¢G¡Óo?A?h?H???O?C¡±L?h?AE3?¡mh?¢G???A£gL(C)?(C)1¡mh(C)T?A2`?J¡mh(C)??A?¢G¡Óo?w¡mh¢X¡m?C?O?G??¡±L?¢G-¡Ñ|?¡±??A?¢G?D|?¡Óo?A?¢G??|????A?¢G¢DO|?¡mH?A?T2¡n¢Dh???A|?|?£gL(C)??¡±?C¡±^?h£gL3/4l¢X]?A¡mD?c3f?]?F£gL3/4l(C)R?A¡mD?c1??]?C¢DO£go?¡±???A?h??¡±???(R)¡Ò?g???A¢X3?¡Ñ??(R)¡Ò¢Dae?[?A¡±??¡±£gL(C)?(C)1?A1/2??B???¡±¡mi?]?C?G£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A??|p2v£gM?C2v£gM???A¡Ó`?s?¡±3D?]?C?¡n??-?¡mh¡±?|??A?¡n??¡±?¡mh-?|??A?¡n????¡mh-?¡±?-?|??C?¡Ó¢X?¡±L¢Di??|p2v£gM¢DG?H??¢Di?C??¡±d?H¡nP?V?H???c?]?A¡E???|P|?|???|?1J-¡E?A????¡Ó??]|p¢D?¢Dk???C?O?G??¢X?(R)I1/2??A¢D1/4??¡m??]?F¡n?¡mi|p?@?A?F?¡±1D?]?F-??X??¡Óo?A|a?¡±2z?]?C?G£g1/2¢D?¡±L???A????-Y???@?H?A?¢G¡Óo?w?]?C¡ÓN-x?¡±?AE?A?R¢DH¡m??A¢D?¢DH?v?A¡Â?¡EM?h???¡±|?¢D??A???¡±£gL?3/4?F(C)????AE?A-2?????A???H£gL???F(C)???(C)~?A?¡Ó??3~?A??¢D??¢G¡Óo1/4{?C¡m?¡nP?¡±???A|p£gn¢X?|?¢Dh??¡Ó??F¡m?¡nP?¡±2`?J1/2?¡mJ?¡±|a?A|?£go??3/4¡Ò?C-Y?X?s|??A?X|?(C)1?A?X|????A2??3/4(C)??¡±?C¡nE?T-x?¡±23?A¡±??¡±(C)??I?A|1?¡Ñ¡ÓN-x?¡±?AE?]?C?E|a?¡±???A(C)}|??¡±?O?A?H¡Ó??¡±2z?A?¢G¢Di?¢G1??]?C?Z?¢X¡m??¡±1D?A2`¡mh¡ÓM?A2L¡mh?2?C¢Dh¢X??V1?|?(R)v???A£g?|a?]?F¢D|1????A??|a?]?F?J2`???A-¡m|a?]?F?J2L???A¡n?|a?]?F-I(C)T¡me1i???A3?|a?]?F£gL(C)?(C)1???A|?|a?]?C?O?G?2|a¡±^¡ÓN?@??¡±??A¡n?|a¡±^¡ÓN???¡±???A?¡±|a¡±^¡ÓN????¡m??A¢Dae|a¡±^¡ÓN????|u?A¢Dae|a¡±^¡ÓN(C)T??£g2?A??|a¡±^¡ÓN????¡m??A-¡m|a¡±^¡ÓN?~??-1?A?x|a¡±^¡ÓN?i??3~?A3?|a¡±^¡ÓN???????A|?|a¡±^¡ÓN¢D??¡±¢DH?¢G???C?G¡±L?¡±¡Ó??G3?¡mh?m?A?¢G¡Óo?w¡mh¢X¡m?A1L¡mh¡Óq?C?O?G?¢G?3/41/2?¡mJ?¡±?????A?¢G¡Â?1w¢Dae?F?¢G?3/4?s?L?B?I???B?q?A?¡±¡±????A?¢G¡Â?|ae-x?F?¢G¢D??m3/4??A?¢G¡Â?¡Óo|a¡±Q?C¢D|?-???A?@?¢G?3/4?A¡mD?Q???¡±¡±L?]?C???Q???¡±¡±L?A¢D??j¢X??A¡mh??23?¢G¡Óo¡nE?F¡m?¢D[(C)?1/4??A¡mh??¢Dae?¢G¡Óo|X?C?O?G?¢G?¡±???U?¡±¢Dae?A?¢G3/4i???U?¡±?v?A¡mH?v?¡±?p?A¡m?¢D[(C)?1/4??A¡mh??¡m¢X¢Di(C)??A??¢X?¢Di?o?C?I£gL?k?¡±1/2??A?a£gL?F?¡±¢DO?C¢D??T-x?¡±23?A-Y???@?H?C¢D??¡±¢DH?AE?A??¡±i¢DH?¢D?F¢D??¡±¢DH(R)`?A??¡±i¢DH¡±Q?C¡±??¡±?`|a£gM¡m?|s?A3??¡±|?|a£gM¡m?¢D??C??233?(C)?(R)`?A£gM¡m?¡Â??¢X3?¡Ó??C?G?¢X¡±L?¡±?AE?A|b????1/4??¡±¡EN?A??1/4??@|V?A?d?1/2¡Ó?¡ÓN?A?O?¡Ñ¢D(C)¡Â?|??AE?C?O?G?F?|?¡±???A|i??¡±?2??A£gL3q?????A1/4F(C)??Y1/4q?¡±?W?A¢DH?????AE?C1/4??H?}???A¢D2¡mE?J?¡±?A¢D???(C)?¡ER?A¡EL¡nP?¡±???A1/2?3/4¢D?H1/4??A¢DH?M3/4??AE?C?O?G(C)l|p3B?k?A1/4??H?}???F¡m?|p2ae???A1/4??¢G??(C)??C

??¡±?2??Q?G

(R)]?l???G?Z??¡±?|3?-?G?@?????H?A?G?????n?A?T????1/2??A¢D|????(R)w?A?-???????C|ae??¢D2|3|]?A|]¢D2¡Â????C£go??|3(R)??A¢X_??|3???C(R)????A???¡±???]?C?????A??|b???B3/4??B?l?B?H?]?C?Z|1¢D|¡ÓJ???A-¡E¢X_?¡±???]?C?Z??¡±??A¢D2|]?-???¡±??|??3?¡±?G??£go(C)????A¡mh|-?3?¡±(C)?¢D~?F??£go|???¡±L?R???A¡m?|???¡±??A¡E¢D?????O?A¢Di¡Óq|?¡Óq?¡±?A?¢G¢Di¡Óq¡mh?W?C??¢Di£go(C)?¢D~?A£gL¡m?(C)????A¢DH(R)?£go?¡±?A??£go?W-¡E?A£gL¡±??U-¡E?A¡Ó?-¡E?[?A(C)]-¡E???C?Z-x¢D2?3/4?-???¡±???A¢DH1/4AE|u?¡±?C?G¢DH??|?¡±???(C)??A¢DH??|?¡±???¡Ój?C??¢Di¢DH£g??A?¢G¢Di¢DH1??C??3/4?3?¡±???|??¢G?k??¢D\?????A(C)R???¡±?O¡Âd???C?G???G(C)?¢DD1/4{?¡±?A?}¡ÓN?k?¡±?A¡mD¡±Q?¢G¢X??A¡mD¡Óo?¢G¢D??A¡mD|M?¢G3/4??C¢DD?¢G¢Di¢DH¡m?|??3(R)v?A¡ÓN?¢G¢Di¢DH¡EY|?¡±?3/4??C|X(C)?¡±Q|?¢X??A?¢G|X(C)?¡±Q|??W?C¡m?¢Di¢DH1/2AE3??A¡EY¢Di¢DH1/2AE¡n??A?`¢X??¢G¢Di¢DH1/2AE|s?A|????¢G¢Di¢DH1/2AE¢D??C?G(C)?¢DD¡EV?¡±?A?}¡ÓN?£g?¡±?C|1|w¢X?¢D?-x?¡±1D?]?C

¢D???2??Q?T

(R)]?l???G ?Z?3(R)v?Q?U?A¢DX(C)??d?1/2?A|?(C)m?¡±?O?A?1/2(R)a?¡±(C)^?A???O?d?¡Ò?A??¢D~??¢X??A¡m?(C)?1D???A?¢G¡Óo3/4??AE???A?C?Q?U(R)a?C??|u1/4AE|~?A¢DH?¡±?@???¡±3??A|?¡ER???S|??¡Ò?A?¢G?3/41/4??¡±¡Ó????A?¢G?¡Â?¡±|??]?A¡mD¢D??¡±¡ÓN?]?A¡mD¢DD?¡±|??]?A¡mD3??¡±¢DD?]?C?G(C)?¡±g1/2?¡ÓN(C)?¢DH¢X?|?3??H?A|?¢D\¢DX(C)?23???A¢D??3/4?]?C¢D??3/4???A?¢G¢Di??(C)?¢X-¡Â¡m?A?¢G¢Di?H(C)??AE?A?¢G¢Di??(C)?¡m¡Ñ?A¢D2??(C)??H?A?3/41/4??¡±¡Ó????]?C?G¢D???|3?-?G|3|]???A|3?????A|3?????A|3|????A|3¢D????C?-??-?¢X_?A2??3/4??1D?A?O?¡Ñ¡Â¡m???A?H¡±g?¡±?_?]?C?m?????A|]???m?H|?¢D??¡±?F???????A|]??(C)x?H|?¢D??¡±?F???????A|]??1/4???|?¢D??¡±?F|??????A?¢X¡n¢D?AE(C)?¢D~?A¢DO¡±^¡nD?3/4?¡±|???(C)?1/4????]?F¢D??????A??3??]?C?G?T-x?¡±?AE?A2???(C)????A1/2?2?¡mp(C)????A?AE2?¡ÓK(C)????A¡mD?t1/2??¢G¡Â?¢D????A¡mD?¡Â?q?¢G¡Â??????A¡mD¡EL¡±(R)?¢G¡Â?¡Óo???¡±1??C¡EL¡mv¡EL¡mv?I£gL(C)??¢G¢D????]?C???AE¢D1/4£go|?¢D?¡nD???A??¡nP(C)?¡±i??-?|??C?Z-x?¡±(C)?¡Ó??¡n?A¡m¢X?¡±(C)?¡Ó?¡±??A?H?¡±(C)?¡Ó?¡Ó??A¢D2¢D??3/4??|u¡ÓN?B¢D?¢Dk?B?????B?????B???H?¡±(C)m|W?A¢DO¡±^??¢D2¡Â??3/4?¡±?C1/4????¡±????¡±????A|]|?¡±Q?¡±?A3/4?|????¡±?A?G????¢Di¡Óo|?¢D??]?F|]?O|??3/4?¡±?A?G?m???B????¢Di¡Óo|????]?F|]?O|??3/4?¡±?A?G|????¢X¡n¢D?AE?A¢Di??¡±i1/4??F|]?O|??3/4?¡±?A?G¢D???¢Di??|p???C?-???¡±?AE?A¢DD¢D2?3/4?¡±?A?3/4?¡±¢D2|b(C)??????A?G?????¢G¢Di?¢G¡mp?]?C(C)?(R)??¡±?3?]?A¢D?1/4¢X|b(R)L?F(C)P?¡±?3?]?A¡±f??|b(R)??C?G(C)?¡±g1/2?¡ÓN?A¡Â?¢DH?W?1/4?¢X?????A¢D2|??j¢D\?C|1¡±L?¡±-n?A?T-x?¡±(C)?¡m?|?¢X??]?C
